page.title: 09Leisure in Louth
page.content: A survey of 100 people was carried out to find out the different leisure activities in Louth.Some were: Riding 4%,Knitting 8%,Keep Fit 3% and Photography 3%.Overall sport was the most popular at 51%.The activities were enjoyed for various resons eg. interesting,relaxing,or entertaining. 71% of school age people enjoy football and another 6% enjoy tennis. Drinking is enjoyed by 6% of 25 year olds.Whereas 40 year old and O.A.P. prefer to do gardening.Leisure facilities in Louth include:a Swimming Pool,Tennis Courts,a cinema,a playhouse,cricket ground,bowling green,fishing ponds,a sports hall and an athletics club.
